name: alien-economy-light
title: Alien Loot Economy Light
author: zark
description:
Light version of Alien Loot Economy by sensenmann (https://mods.factorio.com/mod/alien-module) with only modules and base components.

Increases compatibility with mods like Bobs and Factorio Extended.

Includes functionality and settings from Alien Loot Economy Rampant Compatibility Fix by KilowattSquall (https://mods.factorio.com/mod/rampant-alienmodule-compat).

Uses same settings as Alien Loot Economy and Alien Loot Economy Rampant Compatibility Fix.

 Not compatible with Alien Loot Economy.
